nodes.text: Beast in the Mouth of the Mountain

The Beast in the Mouth of the Mountain was an immense, cave-dwelling arachnid that lived on the forest moon of Endor in 19 BBY. After it destroyed a number of B1-Series battle droids and clone troopers, Aayla Secura killed it by causing the cave's stalactites to fall on it. As a result, she was worshiped by the native Ewoks.
